title: Sales and Trading Summer Intern
info: I am completing an internship as a trader with multiple trading desks, focusing on transportation finance and emerging markets.

title: Women Trader Academy
info: I learned about Goldman Sachs approach to trading and how their trading teams work together to help advance sustainable economic growth. During the program I was also one of the most successful traders in a trading simulation competition.

title: Research Intern
info: I worked on a signal processing application to improve the speed with which data could be processed. To accomplish this, I worked with an existing C++ pipeline and extended it to include further steps of the algorithm which were previously processed in MatLab.

title: WiTT (Women in Trading and Technology) Program
info: I explored the intersection of trading with technology, as well as learned about functional programming and it's applications for trading. During the program, I completed a project using OCaml, and due to the remote nature of the event had to solve many problems around running and connecting to a remote server for development.

title: London Stock Exchange Group, Virtual Experience Tech Internship
info: I interned from home during the COVID pandemic, learning about the technology powering the trading, as well as exploring the potential of upcoming technologies like cloud computing for trading applications.

title: Imperial College Women in Business, Head of Sponsorship and Events
info: I handled the sponsorship activities, including reaching out to interested companies and striking sponsorship deals for the events run by the society.

title: MEng Electronic and Information Engineering (that's computer engineering for those uneducated swines in the back)
info: Doing my undergraduate degree in electronic and information engineering I attended courses in Mathematics (Calculus, Linear Algebra, Vector Calculus, Complex Numbers and Integral Transforms, Signal Processing), Signal Processing, C++ Programming, Compiler Design, Digital Systems Design (FPGA), Machine Learning, Embedded Systems, Networking, and completed many technical group and individual projects.

title: Diocesan Girls' School (拔萃女書院)
info: Beyond studying the usual school subjects, I moved to Hong Kong from Yangzhou (扬州) and lived there independently from a young age. This has thought me many things about self-organization, teaching myself Cantonese, and navigating differences between cultures.
